originalText.text: Rusalina is an amazing hairstylist. This was my second time visiting her from Washington, DC. After a few unsuccessful visits to some of the greatest salons in D.C. to have my hair dyed into the blond colour I wanted, I decided to visit her in NYC since I travel there a few times a month. Her studio is conveniently located not far away from C train 14st stop and is quite lovely. It‚Äôs a private space where you can have coffee or pizza while getting the service of your choice. She‚Äôs very knowledgeable and gives great advice on how to take care, maintain and style your hair. I was very impressed with the results as I‚Äôm a natural brunette, and the shade of blond I wanted is difficult to achieve especially when your hair has been dyed a few times. I was positively pleased both with the results and the customer service. If you‚Äôre looking for a great hairstylist in Manhattan then Rusalina is your best choice üëçüèª

originalText.text: Obsessed!! I have tried countless stylists and salons in NYC, Paris, and Boston and no one has ever made my hair look so great.  I have fine, dry, damaged hair (two decades of highlighting) which never holds a curl.  I left with the best color, best cut, and best blow dry I have ever had in my life.  Rusalina is so talented, efficient, and a perfectionist.   She doesn‚Äôt over-process and she obviously understands hair of all kinds and knew exactly what to do with mine. I‚Äôm so happy to have finally found my hair stylist for life.  Will never go anywhere else. Thank Rusalina!

originalText.text:
I‚Äôm really fortunate to have Rusalina as my hairdresser. I‚Äôve known her for a long time and every visit to her is as a song of my heart.
Her professionalism, her gentle and creative approach always admire me. My hair is definitely more shiny, softer healthier and I love how she always adds something new to my look.
I can get an answer on any questions and her advice always works.
Her salon is in a fancy neighborhood but prices are affordable.
Highly recommended.

originalText.text: Rusalina is the best hair master you can ever imagine! Besides the greatest friendly atmosphere she provides an amazing service. Your hair will look good like never before. I go to her already for 4 years and for this period we did a lot of experiments with my hair and results are always incredible! Also she gives every time good tips how to take care of your hair. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: My favorite beauty service provider in NY! Rusalina is a brilliant colorist and hair stylist. I was lucky to find her in 2020 and never looked elsewhere again. She always makes my hair look absolutely fabulous and she is a true master at providing advice on choosing specific color and tone to ensure optimal results for your hair texture and length. She is also funny, easygoing and just a great, reliable and awesome human. So glad I found her
